query:
UPDATE proof_compression_jobs_fri
                SET
                    status = 'queued',
                    updated_at = NOW(),
                    processing_started_at = NOW()
                WHERE
                    (
                        status = 'in_progress'
                        AND processing_started_at <= NOW() - $1::INTERVAL
                        AND attempts < $2
                    )
                    OR (
                        status = 'failed'
                        AND attempts < $2
                    )
                RETURNING
                    l1_batch_number,
                    status,
                    attempts,
                    error,
                    picked_by
